title: Riot has lost 700million dollars of profit loss compared to 2017

embed.description: SuperData has assembled its annual Year in Review report, rounding up the top earners across digital games, virtual reality, and gaming video content (GVC) to trace the growth of each sector year-to-year. Digital revenue for premium games on PC and console, for instance, jumped 10 percent since the preceding year, coming in at $17.8 billion for 2018.

body: 2018 was the worst year for Riot games and was the lowest revenue in years. Knowing they only made 1.4billion compared to last year 2.1 billion. Do you think Riot will change or are they going to keep being cheap here?
